import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={songs:[],currentSong:{}};export var songReducer=createSlice({name:"songs",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setSongs:function setSongs(state,action){state.songs=action.payload;},setCurrentSong:function setCurrentSong(state,action){state.currentSong=action.payload;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _songReducer$actions=songReducer.actions,setSongs=_songReducer$actions.setSongs,setCurrentSong=_songReducer$actions.setCurrentSong;export{setSongs,setCurrentSong};export default songReducer.reducer;
